long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Initial Release (v1.0.1)
Complex Password Generator. Allows selection of;
- Password Length
- Character Requirements (UpperCase, LowerCase, Numbers, Special Characters)
- Outputs Password and copies to clipboard

Update (v1.1.1)
Added Memorable Password Generator
- Generates secure password that's easy to memorize
- Added tab feature to toggle between Complex & Memorable password options

Update (v1.1.2)
- Added additional password options for the Memorable Password Generator
- Removed special characters from characters options as it was causing issues with some firewall vendor password constraints

Update (v1.1.3)
- Added additional password options for the Memorable Password Generator
